Title: Komaali Kings
Actors: Adri Abilash, Enoch Akshay, Anushyanthan, Kamalraj Balakrishnan
Plot: Siva Sithambram's (Raja Ganesan) mundane life takes a hilarious turn when a distant relative Pat (King Ratnam) and his family from London decide to stay with him for the duration of their trip to attend a family wedding.
